basicInfo.name: Snipper
basicInfo.flavor: Snipper finally managed to hunt down Kai, the infamous Saber Tiger. This lead to all of other hunters addressing Snipper as the Legendary Hunter.

Normal Attack.desc:
Single Enemy
 - Deals damage equal to 100% of Physical Attack 1 time(s).
Skill Enhancement Effect
 - Increases Damage: To 120% of Physical Attack.

Skill 1.name: Wild Shot
Skill 1.desc:
Single Enemy
 - Deals damage equal to 240% of Physical Attack 1 time(s).
 - 100% chance to inflict Burn. [Duration: 3 Turn(s)]
Skill Enhancement Effect
 - Increases Damage: To 290% of Physical Attack.
Transcend Lv.2 Effect
 - Reduces Cooldown: To 45s.

Skill 2.name: Death Sentence
Skill 2.desc:
Single Enemy
 - Consumes 4 stack(s) of [Hunter's Expertise] to deal additional damage equal to 20% of the target's Max HP. [Limit: 1000% of Snipper's Attack]
 - Deals damage equal to 340% of Physical Attack 1 time(s).
Skill Enhancement Effect
 - Increases Damage: To 410% of Physical Attack.
Transcend Lv.6 Effect
 - Increases Damage: To 26% of the target's Max HP. (HP-based damage limited to 1300% of caster's Attack)

Passive.name: Hunter's Expertise
Passive.desc:
Self
 - Grants 1 stack(s) of Hunter's Expertise when 1 enemy falls in battle. [Max 4 Stack(s)]
Skill Enhancement Effect
 - Increases Effect: Physical Damage Boost to 13%.

transcendence.transcend_7: Increases All Attack, Defense, and HP by 2%.
transcendence.transcend_8: Increases All Attack, Defense, and HP by 2%.
transcendence.transcend_9: Increases All Attack, Defense, and HP by 2%.
transcendence.transcend_10: Increases All Attack, Defense, and HP by 2%.
transcendence.transcend_11: Increases All Attack, Defense, and HP by 2%.
transcendence.transcend_12: Increases All Attack, Defense, and HP by 2%.

profile.likes: Jupy, Evan, Li, pasta, being fair, survival, perseverance, gentle breezes, snow
profile.story: Snipper was originally just a boy living in the Blizzard Plains, until his family was killed. Vowing to take revenge, he became a hunter.

basicInfo.name: Snipper
basicInfo.flavor: Snipper never stopped his training, even after becoming a talented sniper. He shows great potential as a hunter of beasts.

Normal Attack.desc:
Single Enemy
 - Deals damage equal to 90% of Physical Attack 1 time(s).
Skill Enhancement Effect
 - Increases Damage: To 90% of Physical Attack.

 - Increases Damage: To 215% of Physical Attack.

Single Enemy
 - Consumes 4 stack(s) of [Hunter's Expertise] to deal additional damage equal to 15% of the target's Max HP. [Limit: 750% of Snipper's Attack]
 - Deals damage equal to 305% of Physical Attack 1 time(s).
Skill Enhancement Effect
 - Increases Damage: To 305% of Physical Attack.

Passive.desc:
Self
 - Grants 1 stack(s) of Hunter's Expertise when 1 enemy falls in battle. [Max 4 Stack(s)]
